channel.title: Possessor facelift bugged
channel.description:
I facelifted myself as Hunter. My number was 16 those night i jumped into Observer, number 8. The game says i was hunter, all annoucement fine. At the right panel bugged into my target. So its showed up like this | My name(observer) This must be | My name(Hunter)
of course all can saw it was a jump.
other infos: i bleeding at the night when i jumped i was attacked at the night when i jumped.
i think it is abnormal.

item.title: Possessor facelift bugged
item.dc:creator: istvan.tirval
item.description:
I facelifted myself as Hunter. My number was 16
those night i jumped into Observer, number 8.
The game says i was hunter, all annoucement fine.
At the right panel bugged into my target. So its showed up like this | My name(observer)
This must be | My name(Hunter)

of course all can saw it was a jump.

other infos:
i bleeding at the night when i jumped
i was attacked at the night when i jumped.

i think it is abnormal.
